#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<math.h>
#include<cctype>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<cassert>
#include<sstream>
 
using namespace std;
 
#define L long
#define LL long long
#define ULL unsigned long long
//#define D double
#define LD long double
#define MOD 3*1000000007
#define f first
#define s second
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ULL unsigned long long
#define pll pair <L,L>
#define INF ((1<<30)+(1<<29))
 
 
LL gcd(LL a,LL b){return (b)?gcd(b,a%b):a;}
LL lcm(LL a,LL b){return (a*b)/gcd(a,b);}
LL modpow(LL n ,LL k,LL mod)
{LL ans=1;while(k>0){if(k&1)ans=(ans*n)%mod;k>>=1;n=(n*n)%mod;}return ans%mod;}
LL max(LL a,LL b){return (a>b)?a:b;}
LL min(LL a,LL b){return (a<b)?a:b;}
LL ab(LL a){return (a>0)?a:-a;}
 
L max(L a,L b){return (a>b)?a:b;}
L min(L a,L b){return (a<b)?a:b;}
L ab(L a){return (a>0)?a:-a;}
   

LL A[100005]={};

LL calc_inv(LL st,LL n)
{
 if(st>=n)return 0;
 LL ans=calc_inv(st,(n+st)/2);
 ans+=calc_inv(((n+st)/2)+1,n);
 for(LL i=st,j=(n+st)/2+1;j<=n&&i<=(n+st)/2;)
 {
  if(A[i]<=A[j])
   i++;
  else
   ans+=(n+st)/2-i+1,j++;
 }
 sort(A+st,A+n+1);
 return ans;
}



int main()
{
 ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
 LL n,i;
 cin>>n;
 for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  cin>>A[i];
 cout<<calc_inv(0,n-1)<<endl;
 return 0;
}
